titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TEST OF RECENT INFECTION RESULT (HIV) - Description

div.p: TEST OF RECENT INFECTION RESULT (HIV) is the result of the Clinical Investigation which measures the PATIENT's Avidity Score (a test used in conjunction with other information, to classify a newly diagnosed Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) infection as recent or long standing), as recorded at the HIV Clinic Attendance.
